original_title: AKB48グループ臨時総会「AKB48単独公演」
overview: AKB48 Group Rinji Soukai "Shirokuro tsukeyou janai ka!", also known as AKB Fair at Nippon Budoukan, is AKB48's spring concert, including its sister groups SKE48, NMB48 and HKT48. The last solo group performance was by AKB48.
title: AKB48 Group Rinji Soukai - AKB48 Concert
